product_name: Demon Flexforce X D3O Protective Pants - Men's
long_description: With the low-profile Flexforce X D3O protective pants, you can go big when boarding and put your fear aside. Warm and comfortable as a base layer, they help protect hips, tailbone and knees. Ergonomic and breathable D3O(R) padding absorbs more shock than traditional athletic foam, reducing impact from falls. Rip-and-stick straps behind the knee pads let you adjust them to your height and keep them securely in place for a full day of shredding. Perforated Lycra(R) nylon/spandex fabric helps ensure breathability and a secure fit.
